comment: Easy A if you put in the work. She grades discussions last minute at end of semester and you must respond to four people. Be detailed on on them. There are two group work discussions which are easy which is the same like the regular discussions. There are two papers: review paper and final exam paper which is easy. Got a 100 in the class.

Took her for an online class. Had great discussions and was a fun class BUT She graded 8 out of 9 discussions that were done throughout the semester THREE WEEKS BEFORE CLASS WAS OVER (With no feedback!!).      So since I did not receive the majority of my gaded till now.  Somehow I am failing and I don't know why BECAUSE THERE IS NO FEEDBACK!
Long and boring class. Attendance is Mandatory. Missed getting an A by 2 points. If you show up on time to class everyday you will get an A. However, it is a longggggggg class.

Professor Pierce kept the class engaged with offering discussions and finding interesting topics. Active participation in the weekly discussions is essential to passing the course. Near perfect or perfect attendance may exempt you from writing the final paper. No book is needed in the class. Group project requires a 10 min speech for each person.

Really easy class. She is super nice and tells you exactly what she wants. You must be active in the weekly discussions which are pretty easy, nothing really long that you have to write. Only other things are 2 papers which are about 3 pages and a short powerpoint presentation for your final.

Pierce really cares about the subject we discussed (outer space) and has relevant experience in the field. As long as you show up to class, do your discussion posts and are able to follow instructions for your assignments you should be fine. For online it should be the same, follow the instructions do your work (which isn't heavy).
